sentences.english: So she made a fire on her hearth, and threw in some straw.
sentences.chinese: 所以她就在炉膛里生起一把火，并且扔进去一些稻草。

sentences.english: Quickly increase temperature, more uniform temperature in hearth, higher pass-rete of production.
sentences.chinese: 升温快，炉膛温度均匀，产品成品率高。

sentences.english: The entire U-beam particle separator is located at the furnace exit.
sentences.chinese: 整个U型钢颗粒分离系统位于炉膛的出口处。

sentences.english: The limestone particles are heated rapidly to high temperature upon entry into the boiler furnace.
sentences.chinese: 当石灰石颗粒一进入锅炉炉膛，就迅速被加热到高温。

sentences.english: It is a heat carrier, absorbing or releasing heat from the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 它是载热体，从炉膛吸入或放出热量。

sentences.english: Coal was also the fuel that burned in the fireboxes of the new railway engines.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭还是新铁路机车炉膛里燃烧的燃料。

sentences.english: Start F. D. F, then fully open F. D. F inlet vane, and perform the furnace purge for three minutes.
sentences.chinese: 起动风机，将风门开到最大，进行炉膛扫气三分钟。

sentences.english: Silicon carbide bar heating elements on both sides of the shaft furnace in the brick on the square.
sentences.chinese: 硅碳棒加热元件系竖在炉膛两旁的方形砖上。

sentences.english: The house was lighted by coal-oil lamps and heated by potbellied stoves.
sentences.chinese: 屋子用煤油灯照明，用一个炉膛突出的火炉取暖。
